data: I am a self motivated web developer :)
I've always been passionate about technology and its ability to shape the world around us. Through self-study and hands-on experience, I've honed my skills in web development.
I've got my very first job from fiverr. And the carrier journey as a web devloper has been started since then.
Completed 3 jobs there with good feedback.
A web app to to generate invoice and export it as PDF. All data will be saved in localStorage. So data won't be lost with refresh.
